plot: An old man suffering from insomnia, who has kept silence for many years, begins to talk after the arrival of a kind nurse and recounts memories of his remote past.
title: The Strangers
plot_es: An old man suffering from insomnia, who has kept silence for many years, begins to talk after the arrival of a kind nurse and recounts memories of his remote past.
plot_en: An old man suffering from insomnia, who has kept silence for many years, begins to talk after the arrival of a kind nurse and recounts memories of his remote past.
